title: Automation Engineers
subtitle: Automation, Robotics or Mechatronics engineers.
description: Support the day to day automation processes during production as needed
Expertise with Allen-Bradley, Siemens, and CompactLogix
PLC programming and control systems. PLC Programming using ladder, structure text languages
Experience with vision systems, VFD’s, and HMI’s.
Design of electrical design diagrams.
Servo Drive Programming by train or pulse.
Experience programming robots, and troubleshooting problems

title: Industrial Maintenance Engineers
subtitle: Mechanical, Electrical or Mechatronic engineers.
description: Ability to troubleshot pneumatic, hydraulic systems
Ability to work with low and mid voltage equipment
Experience with conveyors, servo motors, VFD’s and valves
Preventive and predictive maintenance
Develop/implement preventive maintenance procedures
Experience working with CMMS, and work order systems
Objective is to improve overall equipment effectiveness (OEE)

title: Plant Engineers
subtitle: Mechanical or Electrical engineers.
description: Designing and developing plans for the installation of new equipment or systems
Troubleshooting and resolving issues with existing equipment or systems
Maintaining and repairing equipment to ensure it operates efficiently and safely
Conducting regular inspections and audits to identify potential issues and areas for improvement
Coordinating with other teams within the organization to ensure projects are completed on time and within budget
Keeping up-to-date with new technologies and industry standards to continually improve processes and operations

title: Continuous improvement engineer
subtitle: Industrial, Mechanical, Electrical or Mechatronic engineers.
description: Identifying areas for improvement in the organization's processes and systems
Analyzing data to determine where improvements can be made
Developing and implementing strategies to improve efficiency and quality
Conducting root cause analysis to identify the underlying causes of problems
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement improvements
Developing and delivering training programs to support continuous improvement efforts
Monitoring and measuring the effectiveness of improvement initiatives
Reporting on progress and results to senior management
Maintaining and updating process documentation and procedures
Staying up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in continuous improvement methodologies

title: Plant CNC Engineers
subtitle: Industrial, Mechanical, Electrical engineers.
description: Programming and setting up CNC machines for production runs
Monitoring the performance of CNC machines and making adjustments as needed
Developing and implementing maintenance plans for CNC equipment
Troubleshooting problems with CNC machines and resolving technical issues
Conducting quality checks on products produced by CNC machines
Collaborating with other engineers and cross-functional teams to optimize production processes and improve efficiency

title: Reliability / Maintenance Technicians
subtitle: Employees possess Mechanical and Electrical Engineering degrees.
description: Ability to troubleshot pneumatic, hydraulic systems
Ability to work with low and mid voltage equipment.
Experience with conveyors, servo motors, VFD’s and valves.
Understanding of HMI, and PLC equipment. Basic troubleshooting.
Preventive and predictive maintenance.
Develop/implement preventive maintenance procedures.
Experience working with CMMS, and work order systems.
Objective is to improve overall equipment effectiveness (OEE).

title: Injection/Blow Molding Technicians
subtitle: Employees possess Mechanical and Electrical Engineering degrees.
description: Adhere to preventive maintenance processes for mold and equipment set-up.
Comply with all company and EH&S safety policies and procedures.
Maintain drawing specs following process temperatures and injection pressures to detect non-conformances.
Verify settings by measuring positions, first-run part, and sample work pieces.
Calculate dimensions and tolerances using knowledge of mathematics and instruments such as micrometers, Vernier calipers, and optical comparator.

title: Certified Welders
subtitle: Employees with welding certifications from technical schools.
description: Reading and understanding blueprints prior to starting a project
Sourcing the materials to be used in the project
Measuring and cutting materials to specifications
Welding materials using the correct materials to join the metals together
Checking finished work to make sure that it falls within the tolerances marked on the blueprints

title: Certified HVAC
subtitle: Employees with HVAC certifications from technical schools in Mexico.
description: Installing, maintaining and repairing ventilation and air conditioning systems and equipment.
Identifying maintenance risks on equipment.
Diagnosing electrical and mechanical faults for HVAC systems.
Cleaning, adjusting and repairing systems, and performing warranty services.
Performing emergency repairs promptly and efficiently
Providing technical direction and on-the-job training
Keeping daily logs and records of all maintenance functions
Ensuring compliance with appliance standards and with Occupational Health and Safety Act
Complying with service standards, work instructions and customers’ requirements
Assisting with customers’ queries

title: Certified CNC Technicians
subtitle: Employees with Mechanical and Electrical engineering degrees from technical schools in Mexico.
description: Maintain and repair all assets to ensure their proper operating condition
Provide preventative and correct maintenance on various complex CNCs – 5 axis milling, mill turn applications, horizontal and vertical lathes
Troubleshoot and repair control & electrical system failures involving – PLCs, HMIs, servomotors, servo amplifiers, input/output, field sensors, and more
Troubleshoot and repair various machine tool hydraulic and pneumatic systems – actuators, valves, pumps, filters, and more
Troubleshoot and repair machine tool mechanical systems – ball screws, linear rails, guideways, gearboxes and more
